root.message: The REG_AGG field for indicator 11-2-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Data at the global/regional levels will be estimated from national figures derived from an aggregation of performance for all cities/urban areas or a sample of nationally representative cities (selected using the national sample of cities approach developed by UN-Habitat). Regional estimates will incorporate national representations using a weighting by population sizes. Global monitoring will be led by UN-Habitat with the support of other partners and regional commissions.
